title: Context-Based Educational Computing Environment Design: Language Domain Project-Based Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of fundamental language structures and proficiency in digital device utilization
context.additional_context: Customized computing environment design for domain-specific language learning (medical/legal/technical) in a limited technological environment centered on smartphones.

learning_goals: Learners can complete project assignments with over 80% accuracy using tools that analyze conceptual complexity (grammatical structures, specialized terminology systems) in language domains

Learners can apply contextual analysis frameworks to develop self-directed learning plans in mobile-based learning environments (quiz apps, collaborative platforms) suitable for intermediate proficiency levels
Through formative assessments (2-week feedback cycle), learners can identify and apply at least three optimal learning strategies within technological constraints (e.g., lack of PC access)

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
